name: X-Men 2: Clone Wars
summary: X-Men 2: Clone Wars is a 1995 platform game developed by Headgames and released by Sega of America for the Mega Drive/Genesis as a sequel to the 1993's X-Men. The game is based on the adventures of the Marvel Comics superhero team, the X-Men. X-Men 2 was praised by critics and won retrospective acclaim as one of the best games on the platform. A sequel, titled X-Women, was cancelled.
